author: andschwa
body: They should be part of the Utility module according to PS docs  https   technet.microsoft.com en us library hh849922.aspx   Steps to reproduce    get command  > this lists convertto json   get process   convertto json     this doesn't work   get command  > this will not list convertto json anymore  ping jim truher about help with this, or Lee Holmesget  ConvertTo From Json cmdlets fail because they require System.Web.Extensions and attempt to load them at runtime   System.Reflection.Assembly.Load  System.Web.Extensions, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35  ;  CoreCLR does not have System.Web.Extensions support.  VSO create date - 8/3/2015 9:20:00     VSO closed date - 8/4/2015 15:38:00
title: See why ConvertTo-Json and ConvertFrom-Json Cmdlets are not available on Linux
